comments.html: Here's something to consider: assuming one outage every two years (per site), what kind of application would you have to run to care about the difference between 50 msec convergence and 5 sec convergence?
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Mission Critical Voice is the app. See Public Safety requirements. 1.5sec total re-convergence based on 300ms BFD timer (3 packet lost) + some time na IGP reconvergence.
comments.name: Bogdan Golab

comments.html: So according to your rhetorical question there wasn't a business need for subsecond convergence. Either way for subsecond convergence you need more than just fast failure detection. Btw you can't detect gray failures with BFD. It's only checking forwarding (data plane).
